      • put

        public CommonMessage put(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String value)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a TextMessage that is then filled with required values for the put command and send to the responsible server. If SERVER_NOT_RESPONSIBLE is received, update the metadata, reestablish the connection with the correct server and retry the put operation.
        Specified by:
        put in interface KVCommInterface
        Parameters:
        key - the key that identifies the given value.
        value - the value that is indexed by the given key.
        Returns:
        a message that confirms the insertion of the tuple or an error.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if put command cannot be executed (e.g. not connected to any KV server).

      • get

        public CommonMessage get(java.lang.String key)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a TextMessage that is then filled with required values for the get command and send to the responsible server. If SERVER_NOT_RESPONSIBLE is received, update the metadata, reestablish the connection with the correct server and retry the get operation.
        Specified by:
        get in interface KVCommInterface
        Parameters:
        key - the key that identifies the value.
        Returns:
        the value, which is indexed by the given key.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if put command cannot be executed (e.g. not connected to any KV server).

      • subscribe

        public KVMessage subscribe(java.lang.String type,

        Creates a TextMessage that is then filled with required values for the subscribe command and send to the responsible server.
